item.title: CVE-2023-20748|2024-08-02T09:14:41.044Z -- mediatek%2C%20inc. -- mt6879%2C%20mt6886%2C%20mt6895%2C%20mt6983%2C%20mt6985%2C%20mt8673%2C%20mt8781
item.description: In display, there is a possible out of bounds read due to a missing bounds check. This could lead to local information disclosure with System execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation. Patch ID: ALPS07536951; Issue ID: ALPS07536951.
